channel.title: 317 pvp server
channel.description:
This Is my first 317 server what i am creating.
What has been added:
508/525 karil Bow Animations 508/525 Bow Animations 508/525 Cross Bow Animations All Godsword Specials As Good As i Can Make Them Be All Godsword Defending/Blocking/Running/Attack Animations The /508/525 Dragon Claw Special 508/525 Veng Other/Vengance Fixed The Way To farm Cannot Attack With no items [ That dont fix farm ]
What im trying to add/do:
Welcome Interface Kbd Interface For The Kbd Heads Instead Of Text. Quest Skillcape Emote / Allready Have Gfx Changing Training Spot From Burthope To.. Any Ideas? New Magic Icons On/Off Items On Death Add Text For The Kq To Say Something. Changing Skill Area And Add Some Skills
If You Have Any Ideas What I Should Add/Do Just Pm Me Or Post On This Thread Thanks!
This Is Home [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2yux9b7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2ujhy13.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2colk7s.png[/img]
Quest Gfx/Still Working On [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/ac2z2a.png[/img]
Highscores/ [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/b4gln7.png[/img]

item.title: 317 pvp server
item.dc:creator: @watch_range watch range
item.description:
@watch_range wrote:

[quote=“DemisePking, post:9, topic:324372”]Seriously GTFO. This is just my server.
Quest cape gfx working on it? I added that dicklump.
Id appreciate it if you atleast added “100% credits to demise” at the top for everything YOUVE done.[/quote]
Couldn’t of said it any better Demise, I’m ‘Downed’ from server. This is all of your work. Noobs leeching.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,420775.0.html
There’s Demise’s server.

Read full topic
